alert.note: Alert for Billings; Golden Valley; McKenzie (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 01 at 7:34PM CDT until August 01 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM MDT FOR NORTHEASTERN GOLDEN VALLEY...NORTHERN BILLINGS AND SOUTH CENTRAL MCKENZIE COUNTIES... At 633 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 16 miles southwest of Grassy Butte, or 32 miles northeast of Beach, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... South Fairfield around 705 PM MDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Elkhorn State Natural Area and Fairfield. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
